author: Lotte Duncan
method: Put all the ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the sugar has dissolved.  Strain the cider into tumblers and serve.
ingredients: 2 pint (1.2L) medium dry cider,  4oz (110g) soft brown sugar,  12 whole cloves,  4 sticks of cinnamon,  8 whole allspice,  1 apple, thinly sliced,  6 dried apricots, thinly sliced
